about_the_game:
This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "Changeover: Decisions" created for you by "Jean" group, Dmitry Fedotov and others. You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (14 total):
1. Decisions by Dmitry Fedotov
2. New Spring by Jean
3. March by Jean
4. Fall Down by Jean
5. Adieu by Jean
6. Jean Ty by Jean
7. Exploration by Dmitry Fedotov
8. Sad Sunset by Dmitry Fedotov
9. Impending Threat by Jack Midkiff
10. Expectation by Dmitry Fedotov
11. Unexpected Meeting by Dmitry Fedotov
12. Dark Descent by Matthew Pablo
13. Unconsciousness by Dmitry Fedotov
14. Underground Lab by Dmitry Fedotov

Buying the DLC you support the developer
detailed_description:
This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "Changeover: Decisions" created for you by "Jean" group, Dmitry Fedotov and others. You can easily play it by Steam Music Player. You can also find the MP3 versions in your game folder.

Track list (14 total):
1. Decisions by Dmitry Fedotov
2. New Spring by Jean
3. March by Jean
4. Fall Down by Jean
5. Adieu by Jean

8. Sad Sunset by Dmitry Fedotov
9. Impending Threat by Jack Midkiff
10. Expectation by Dmitry Fedotov

12. Dark Descent by Matthew Pablo

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04 (x64)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL Compatible Sound Card

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 Mavericks
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: Changeover: Decisions - Original Soundtrack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (x64)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512 MB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible

short_description: This DLC contains the full versions of all the soundtracks from "Changeover: Decisions"
